verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> visited <S%H6485><s%> Sarah <S%H8283><s%> as he had said, <S%H559><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to Sarah <S%H8283><s%> as he had spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

For Sarah <S%H8283><s%> conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> in his old <S%H2208><s%> age, at the set <S%H4150><s%> time of which <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to him.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of his son <S%H1121><s%> that was born <S%H3205><s%> to him, whom <S%H834><s%> Sarah <S%H8283><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> to him, Isaac. <S%H3327><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> circumcised <S%H4135><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> being eight <S%H8083><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> as God <S%H430><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him.
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> was an hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> when his son <S%H1121><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> to him.
And Sarah <S%H8283><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has made me to laugh, <S%H6712><s%> so that all <S%H3605><s%> that hear <S%H8085><s%> will laugh <S%H6711><s%> with me.

And she said, <S%H4448><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> would have said <S%H4448><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> that Sarah <S%H8283><s%> should have given children <S%H1121><s%> suck? <S%H3243><s%> for I have born <S%H3205><s%> him a son <S%H1121><s%> in his old <S%H2208><s%> age.

And the child <S%H3206><s%> grew, <S%H1431><s%> and was weaned: <S%H1580><s%> and Abraham <S%H85><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> feast <S%H4960><s%> the same day <S%H3117><s%> that Isaac <S%H3327><s%> was weaned. <S%H1580><s%>

And Sarah <S%H8283><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hagar <S%H1904><s%> the Egyptian, <S%H4713><s%> which <S%H834><s%> she had born <S%H3205><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> mocking. <S%H6711><s%>

Why she said <S%H559><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Cast <S%H1644><s%> out this <S%H2063><s%> female slave <S%H519><s%> and her son: <S%H1121><s%> for the son <S%H1121><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> female slave <S%H519><s%> shall not be heir <S%H3423><s%> with my son, even with Isaac. <S%H3327><s%>
And the thing <S%H1697><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> grievous <S%H7489><s%> in Abraham's <S%H85><s%> sight <S%H5869><s%> because <S%H2921><s%> <S%H182><s%> of his son. <S%H1121><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Let it not be grievous <S%H7489><s%> in your sight <S%H5869><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of the lad, <S%H5288><s%> and because <S%H5921><s%> of your female slave; <S%H519><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that Sarah <S%H8283><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> to you, listen <S%H8085><s%> to her voice; <S%H6963><s%> for in Isaac <S%H3327><s%> shall your seed <S%H2233><s%> be called. <S%H7121><s%>
And also of the son <S%H1121><s%> of the female slave <S%H519><s%> will I make <S%H7760><s%> a nation, <S%H1471><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he is your seed. <S%H2233><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> rose <S%H7925><s%> up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> and a bottle <S%H2573><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> it to Hagar, <S%H1904><s%> putting <S%H7760><s%> it on <S%H5921><s%> her shoulder, <S%H7926><s%> and the child, <S%H3206><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> her away: and she departed, <S%H3212><s%> and wandered <S%H8582><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Beersheba. <S%H884><s%>
And the water <S%H4325><s%> was spent <S%H3615><s%> in the bottle, <S%H2573><s%> and she cast <S%H7993><s%> the child <S%H3206><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of the shrubs. <S%H7880><s%>

And she went, <S%H3212><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> her down over <S%H5048><s%> against <S%H5048><s%> him a good <S%H7368><s%> way off, as it were a bow shot: <S%H2909><s%> <S%H7198><s%> for she said, <S%H559><s%> Let me not see <S%H7200><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the child. <S%H3206><s%> And she sat <S%H3427><s%> over <S%H5048><s%> against <S%H5048><s%> him, and lift <S%H5375><s%> up her voice, <S%H6963><s%> and wept. <S%H1058><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the lad; <S%H5288><s%> and the angel <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to Hagar <S%H1904><s%> out of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to her, What <S%H4100><s%> ails you, Hagar? <S%H1904><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> not; for God <S%H430><s%> has heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the lad <S%H5288><s%> where <S%H834><s%> he is.
Arise, <S%H6965><s%> lift <S%H5375><s%> up the lad, <S%H5288><s%> and hold <S%H2388><s%> him in your hand; <S%H3027><s%> for I will make <S%H7760><s%> him a great <S%H1419><s%> nation. <S%H1471><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> opened <S%H6491><s%> her eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and she saw <S%H7200><s%> a well <S%H875><s%> of water; <S%H4325><s%> and she went, <S%H3212><s%> and filled <S%H4390><s%> the bottle <S%H2573><s%> with water, <S%H4325><s%> and gave the lad <S%H5288><s%> drink. <S%H8248><s%>
And God <S%H430><s%> was with the lad; <S%H5288><s%> and he grew, <S%H1431><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and became <S%H1961><s%> an archer. <S%H7198><s%>

And he dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran: <S%H6290><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him a wife <S%H802><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass at that time, <S%H6256><s%> that Abimelech <S%H40><s%> and Phichol <S%H6369><s%> the chief captain <S%H8269><s%> of his host <S%H6635><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is with you in all <S%H3605><s%> that you do: <S%H6213><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore swear <S%H7650><s%> to me here <S%H2008><s%> by God <S%H430><s%> that you will not deal falsely <S%H8266><s%> with me, nor with my son, <S%H5220><s%> nor with my son's <S%H5220><s%> son: <S%H5220><s%> but according to the kindness <S%H2617><s%> that I have done <S%H6213><s%> to you, you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to me, and to the land <S%H776><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> you have sojourned. <S%H1481><s%>
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I will swear. <S%H7650><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> reproved <S%H3198><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H182><s%> of a well <S%H875><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Abimelech's <S%H40><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> had violently <S%H1497><s%> taken <S%H1497><s%> away.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> not who <S%H4310><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing; <S%H1697><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> did you tell <S%H5046><s%> me, neither <S%H3808><s%> yet <S%H1571><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> I of it, but to day. <S%H3117><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> and oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them to Abimelech; <S%H40><s%> and both <S%H8147><s%> of them made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant. <S%H1285><s%>
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> set <S%H5324><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> ewe <S%H3535><s%> lambs <S%H3535><s%> of the flock <S%H6629><s%> by themselves.

And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> mean these seven <S%H7651><s%> ewe <S%H3535><s%> lambs <S%H3535><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have set <S%H5324><s%> by themselves?

And he said, <S%H559><s%> For these seven <S%H7651><s%> ewe <S%H3535><s%> lambs <S%H3535><s%> shall you take <S%H3947><s%> of my hand, <S%H3027><s%> that they may be a witness <S%H5713><s%> to me, that I have dig <S%H2658><s%> this well. <S%H875><s%>
Why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> that place <S%H4725><s%> Beersheba; <S%H884><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> they swore <S%H7650><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them.

Thus they made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> at Beersheba: <S%H884><s%> then Abimelech <S%H40><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up, and Phichol <S%H6369><s%> the chief captain <S%H8269><s%> of his host, <S%H6635><s%> and they returned <S%H7725><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> planted <S%H5193><s%> a grove <S%H815><s%> in Beersheba, <S%H884><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> God. <S%H410><s%>
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> sojourned <S%H1481><s%> in the Philistines' <S%H6430><s%>land <S%H776><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>
